title: Answering farmers' questions about the Sustainable Farming Incentive - part 2

content.text: The Farming Forum recently held a Q&A session with Janet Hughes, Defra’s Future Farming and Countryside Programme Director.
Farmers were invited to submit their questions about the Sustainable Farming Incentive.
Clive Bailye, Director of the Farming Forum, put the most-asked questions to Janet.
This is part 2 of 2. Watch part 1.
